text: Ezɨ gumazamizir maba bizir kabagh fozir puvatɨ. Marazi fomɨra marvir guabar arazibar gɨn ghuegha kamaghɨn amigha, datɨrɨghɨn asɨzir me apir kaba, me ghaze, kar marvir guabar guizɨn ofa. Men nɨghnɨziba kuiaghirezir puvatɨgha gavgavizir puvatɨzɨ, me asɨzir kaba apava ghaze, me derazir puvatɨzir arazim gami.
